short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to audio summaries of articles you read online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Who has the time to read everything?

AudioSum breaks up your web articles into bit sized audio chunks. Just click the play button in the bookmark bar and listen to the short audio summary. There really is no more need to read everything or listen to long articles. You might be pleasantly surprised to finally hear what you've always been missing all along. 

Now go on with your day...

If you need to talk to me visit https://audiosum.com
